instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Mobile data . Tap the Menu key. Select or clear the Restrict background data check box.
From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Accounts & sync . Select or clear the Auto-sync data check box.
